Description:
Identifies when a device in azure is no longer managed or compliant

Author: Austin Songer @austinsonger
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Azure Device No Longer Managed or Compliant
Query: sourcetype='azure-activitylogs' eql select * from _source_ where (properties.message = 'device no longer compliant' or properties.message = 'device no longer managed')
